data.name: Box to the Box
data.detailed_description:
The box is running.
The box follows after the box.
The box follows after the box after the box.
The box follows after the box after the box after the box.
The box follows after the box after the box after the box after the box.
The box follows after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box.

After the box after the box Ahh... Uhm... Anyway, the box follows after the box.

The reason why the box runs are to escape.(That's what they say)

The boxes are going down.
Only one box will reach the end.
But it is known that there is nothing at the end.

Features

  • 50 Stages Available : Try to reach to the end.
  • Cooperate with your past self : You can't handle everything by oneself. Go back in the past and solve the problem cooperating with you in the past.
  • Various devices block your way. But it won't be a big problem.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
